chapters.title: Login User
chapters.content: POST ${BASE_URL}/users/login Request Body: { "email": "client@demo.com", "password": "demo", "loginSource": "web" } Success Response (200): { "message": "login successfully...", "user": { "id": "user_123", "username": "johndoe", "email": "john.doe@example.com", "roleId": 1, "profile": { "firstName": "John", "lastName": "Doe" }, "role":{ "id": 1, "name": "admin" }, "createdAt": "2024-01-05T12:00:00Z", "updatedAt": "2024-01-05T12:00:00Z" } } Error Response (401): 1 / 5 # üìå API Documentation (Base Route).md 2025-09-10 { "error": "Invalid credentials" }

chapters.title: Refresh Token
chapters.content: POST ${BASE_URL}/users/refresh-token (Use this when the access token is expired, but refresh token is still valid) Request Body: (No body required, just send the refresh token in headers/cookies depending on implementation) Success Response (200): { "message": "Token refreshed successfully", "user": { "id": "user_123", "username": "johndoe", "email": "john.doe@example.com", "roleId": 1, "profile": { "firstName": "John", "lastName": "Doe" }, "createdAt": "2024-01-05T12:00:00Z", "updatedAt": "2024-01-05T12:00:00Z" } }

chapters.title: Logout User
chapters.content: POST ${BASE_URL}/users/logout (Requires Authorization: Bearer {token}) Request Body: (No body required) Success Response (200): { "message": "Logged out successfully" } 2 / 5 # üìå API Documentation (Base Route).md 2025-09-10 üë§ User Management APIs

chapters.title: Create User
chapters.content: POST ${BASE_URL}/users/create-user (Requires Authorization: Bearer {token}) Request Body: { "username": "johndoe", "authPassword": "MySecretPassword123!", "email": "john.doe@example.com", "roleId": 1, "profile": { "firstName": "John", "lastName": "Doe", "phone": "+1234567890" } } Success Response (201): { "message": "User created successfully", "user": { "id": "user_123", "username": "johndoe", "email": "john.doe@example.com", "roleId": 1, "profile": { "firstName": "John", "lastName": "Doe" }, "createdAt": "2024-01-05T12:00:00Z", "updatedAt": "2024-01-05T12:00:00Z" } } üìß Request Password Reset POST ${BASE_URL}/users/request-password-reset Request Body: 3 / 5 # üìå API Documentation (Base Route).md 2025-09-10 { "email": "john.doe@example.com" } Success Response (200): { "message": "Password reset email sent" } üîê Reset Password POST ${BASE_URL}/users/reset-password Request Body: { "token": "reset-token-from-email", "newPassword": "MyNewPassword123!" } Success Response (200): { "message": "Password reset successful" } üîë Change Password POST ${BASE_URL}/users/change-password Request Body (example changePasswordSchema): { "oldPassword": "MyOldPassword123!", "newPassword": "MyNewPassword123!" } Success Response (200): 4 / 5 # üìå API Documentation (Base Route).md 2025-09-10 { "message": "Password changed successfully" } 5 / 5
